thread.title: Ants to introduce Steve Gansey as new head coach Friday
thread.title_full: Ants to introduce Steve Gansey as new head coach Friday

title: Ants to introduce Steve Gansey as new head coach Friday
text:
Ants to introduce Steve Gansey as new head coach Friday 
By Eric Dutkiewicz - 21Alive Ants to introduce Steve Gansey as new head coach Friday October 1, 2015 Updated Oct 1, 2015 at 5:34 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, Ind. (21Alive) – The Fort Wayne Mad Ants will introduce their new head coach on Friday. As 21Alive first told you last Friday, the new head man will be former Mad Ants Assistant and Interim coach Steve Gansey. 
The franchise has called an 11 a.m. news conference at Memorial Coliseum, where new Ants general manager Brian Levy will make the announcement. 
The coaching change comes as Conner Henry left the Ants in June to become head coach of the NBA Development League’s Los Angeles D-Fenders. Henry has since been hired as an assistant coach on the Orlando Magic. 
Last month, the Pacers Sports & Entertainment bought the Mad Ants, and named Levy general manager. What are your thoughts CLICK HERE to leave us a "QUESTION OF THE DAY” comment.
